Html:
There were rumors that the Ignite was fixed. I decided to check it out. I have included CombustionHelper, broken mannequin and got the following results:

ignite expected : 345664 -- ignite applied : 344640 -- ignite lost : 1024 / 0%

ignite expected : 129404 -- ignite applied : 129405 -- ignite lost : -1 / -0%

This will be included in the Rawr?

PS: Sorry for bad English.

If you go to the options menu -> Spells & Buff tab, you will see Ignite Munching. Currently it's set to 0.08. If ignite is coming up as 0 for you then change that 0.08 to 0. All that that Ignite Munching modifier does is lower the amount of ignite damage being generated by said percentage.
